{"name": "Food and Friends", "alternate_name": "", "description": "No income requirements. Must be referred by medical professional. Application available online: https://foodandfriends.org/how-to-get-meals/z
We cannot guarantee a specific delivery time within this schedule.
Someone must be home to receive the food, but it does not have to be you or anyone in particular.
To arrange an alternative delivery option, please call (202) 269-6820. You have the option to make the arrangement permanent or for a single day only.", "email": "", "url": "https://foodandfriends.org/how-to-get-meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "219 Riggs Road Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20011", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9556884, "longitude": -77.0021514}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 269-2277", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Lunch"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Dinner"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Serves HIV Positive patients only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Eligibility: Chronic or life-altering illness like cancer, Alzheimer’s, renal failure, COPD, HIV/AIDS. Check your eligibility at https://www.glwd.org/get-meals/find-out-if-you-are-eligible-for-medically-tailored-meals/"}]}
